description.content: Sends information on the bot's commands.

help.list: A list of all available commands.
help.more_info: For more information on a specific command, send `{{prefix}}{{alias}} <command>`.

ping.description: Gets the ping of the bot.

description.content: Blocks a given user on the wiki.

block.already_blocked: That user is already blocked! To unblock them, you can pass the `--unblock` flag.

prompt.user: {{- author}}, which user do you wish to block?

expiry.start: {{- author}}, for how long shall I block this user for?
expiry.retry: {{- author}}, that doesn't look like a valid time!

description.content: Lists all pages in a given category on the set wiki.

category.prompt: {{- author}}, which category shall I list the pages of?

description.content: Deletes a given page on the set wiki, with an optional reason for deletion.

delete.prompt: {{- author}}, which page shall I delete?

description.content: Edits a given page on the set wiki, with the option of either appending or prepending content.

prompt.page: {{- author}}, which page shall I edit?
prompt.content: {{- author}}, what do you wish to add to {{page}}?
prompt.position: {{- author}}, do you wish to `prepend` or `append` this content to {{page}}?

description.content: Moves (renames) a page on the set wiki.

prompt.old: {{- author}}, which page shall I move?
prompt.new: {{- author}}, what shall the page's new name be?

description.content: Protects a given page on the wiki with an optional expiry.

prompt.page: {{- author}}, which page shall I protect?

expiry.start: {{- author}}, for how long shall this page be protected for?
expiry.retry: {{- author}}, that doesn't look like a valid time!

usergroup.start: {{- author}}, which usergroup shall be allowed to edit this page?
usergroup.retry: {{- author}}, that doesn't look like a valid usergroup!

description.content: Restores/undeletes a given page on the set wiki.

undelete.prompt: {{- author}}, which page shall I unprotect?

eval.prompt: {{- author}}, what code shall I evaluate?

ssh.prompt: {{- author}}, enter a command for me to run!
ssh.long: Result too long to send: {{- link}}

prompt.cancelled: Alright, the command has been cancelled.
prompt.ended: More than 3 tries and you still didn't quite get it. The command has been cancelled.
prompt.timeout: You took too long to respond, command has been cancelled.

wiki_action.no_wiki: There isn't a wiki set up for this server, yet!
wiki_action.no_roles: This command requires a role to be set and given to users to prevent abuse.
wiki_action.need_roles: You need one of the following roles to use this command.
wiki_action.no_credentials: I am not logged into a wiki bot!

missing_permissions.user_missing: you am missing the following permission to run this command:
missing_permissions.user_missing_plural: you am missing the following permissions to run this command:
missing_permissions.client_missing: I am missing the following permission to run this command:
missing_permissions.client_missing_plural: I am missing the following permissions to run this command:
